english.segment1: Is this love. or something to think of?
english.segment2: We fool ourselves for comfort, we're swayed by every wind. And if this isn't true love, then we can just pretend. But what is love?
english.segment3: This is love. that you would die for me.
english.segment4: Is this real, or something to feel?
english.segment5: Confused by our emotions, confused by what we see. We trade in our patience, for false security. But is this love?
english.segment6: This is love, that you would die for me.
english.segment7: When I'm falling down, you save me.
english.segment8: This is how I know what love is.
